summary: The Civil War in Russia has just finished. The sixth chief of militia came to a small town in the south. Five Glodovs predecessors had been killed by a gang of elusive Vakhromeyev. Now ... See full summary Â»
cast: Sergey Nikonenko|Vladimir Grammatikov|Mikhail Pugovkin|Yevgeny Bakalov|Timofey Spivak|Sergei Ulyanov|Makharbek Kokoev|Mikhail Kozakov|Larisa Belogurova|Nina Menshikova|Marina Yakovleva|Vladimir Dmitriev|Aleksandr Galibin|Boris Gitin|Gegi Gujejiani|Marina Gurevich|Viktor Melnikov|Georgiy Millyar|Sergey Nikolaev|Valeri Yanklovich|Levan Zakareishvili|Oleg Fedulov
title: Shestoy
